package2.title: Samarkand + Bukhara
package2.description: A wonderful opportunity to visit unique destinations praised as the ornament of the Earth and the strength of Islam! Gift a journey to your family and loved ones!

package4.title: Sharm El Sheikh
package4.description: Experience the Red Sea's paradise with stunning coral reefs and luxurious resorts.

package5.title: Dubai
package5.description: Discover the futuristic city with breathtaking architecture and endless shopping.

package6.title: Maldives
package6.description: Relax in overwater bungalows surrounded by crystal-clear turquoise waters.
